advance.no-entries: There are no entries selected for advancement. Please specify the entries to be advanced on the observations tab and try again.

breeding-methods.title: Methods
breeding-methods.description: Breeding Method is the same for each advance
breeding-methods.variable: Choose a variate that defines the breeding method for each advance

selection-trait.title: Selection Trait
selection-trait.description: Choose a variate that defines the value of the selection trait

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.propagate.attributes.data: Propagate attributes data to the advanced lines
attributes.propagate.passport.descriptor.data: Propagate passport descriptor data to the advanced lines

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: Same number of lines is selected for each plot
lines.variable: Choose a variate that defines the number of lines selected from each plot

bulks.title: Bulks
bulks.variable: Choose a variate that defines which plots were selected

errors.breeding-method.selection.variate.not-pr: The study must contain a Selection Variate that provides the breeding methods.
errors.lines.selection.variate.not-present: The study must contain a Selection Variate that provides the number of plants selected.
